title: goinstall: some kind of support for #cgo and pkg-config
body:
It would be very useful if cgo recognized and expanded things in backticks in the #cgo
comments. Many libraries rely on things like pkg-config.

In IRC, str1ngs brought up the possibility of `rm -rf /` appearing, and that is a bit
frightening, but we already have that vulnerability with makefiles. I could go either
way with this.
